trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnBeginResizing*> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnResizing*> methods.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<> *1> 和<> *1> 方法。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs contains information used by an activity designer when a user resized the activity designer on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs 包含在用户调整大小时活动设计器工作流设计图面上的所使用的活动设计器的信息。

trans-unit.source: This information includes the designer edge that is being used to resize the designer and the designer's new bounds.
trans-unit.target: 此信息包括用于调整设计器和设计器的新边界的大小的设计器边缘。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> value and <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerResizeEventArgs"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref>值和<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> to use to resize the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref>要用于调整活动设计器的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the resized bounds of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，表示活动设计器的调整后的边界。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new bounding rectangle for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 获取的新边框<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>工作流设计图面上。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the new bounds of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示活动设计器的新边界。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer edge used to resize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于调整大小的设计器边缘<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>工作流设计图面上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"></xref> used to resize the activity designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerEdges"> </xref>用于调整工作流设计图面上的活动设计器的大小。
